name: PANDAmonium (Ducourtz)
description:
Our young Hero (Panda of his state) must go through a succession of levels (And incidentally collect coins for his retirement) during a deluge of fire and explosions (John Woo in the staging) Can you help him in his mission and reach Satan's palace? (Which would mean that my game is over!)

Gamepad is recommended.

Left Stick, WASD : Move Panda

Right Stick, Mouse : Turn Camera

Button A, Space : Jump

Notre jeune Héros (Panda de son état) doit parcourir une succession de niveaux (Et accessoirement amasser des pièces pour sa retraite) pendant un déluge de feu et d'explosions (John Woo à la mise en scène) Saurez-vous l'aider dans sa mission et parvenir au palais de Satan ? (Ce qui voudrait dire que ce jeu est terminé !)

Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
